normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The New Biryani for Students This Season?**

unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The New Biryani for Students This Season?**
normalised: Education Technology is buzzing! Forget endless textbooks, Indian students are increasingly turning to exam prep apps to ace everything from I I T-J E E to U P S C. Remember struggling through complex physics problems? Now, apps like 'CrackItNow' and 'EduMitra' offer personalized learning paths, mock tests galore, even doubt-clearing sessions with top educators - all on your phone!

unnormalised: Education Technology is buzzing! Forget endless textbooks, Indian students are increasingly turning to exam prep apps to ace everything from IIT-JEE to UPSC. Remember struggling through complex physics problems? Now, apps like 'CrackItNow' and 'EduMitra' offer personalized learning paths, mock tests galore, and even doubt-clearing sessions with top educators - all on your phone!
normalised: Think of it like having a pocket-sized coaching center. It's a game-changer, especially for students in smaller towns like Amethi or Patna, leveling the playing field.

normalised: With Onam just around the corner, many are skipping the traditional feasting (okay, maybe just a little!) to cram with these apps. "My rank improved by leaps and bounds thanks to EduMitra's A I-powered assessments," says Rohan Sharma, an aspiring engineer from Delhi.

unnormalised: With Onam just around the corner, many are skipping the traditional feasting (okay, maybe just a little!) to cram with these apps. "My rank improved by leaps and bounds thanks to EduMitra's AI-powered assessments," says Rohan Sharma, an aspiring engineer from Delhi.
normalised: But are these apps *really* worth the hype? Experts say it's all about finding the right fit and avoiding information overload. Too much biryani, even of the digital variety, can cause indigestion! Costs can also add up, so compare before you commit. Still, the trend is undeniable: exam prep apps are here to stay.
